description:
The Time Travellerâ€™s Almanac Part 2: Reactionaries and Revolutionaries by Ann & Jeff VanderMeer





Beware the butterfly effect! With stories from Ray Bradbury, George R.R. Martin, Harry Turtledove, here are 16 journeys into the past that might just change everything, forever.

Intrepid chrononauts Ann and Jeff VanderMeer have scoured time itself to bring you this instalment (the second of four) from their Ã¼ber-guide to exploring the fourth dimension, THE TIME TRAVELLERâ€™S ALMANAC. Be warned: reality will be warped, wormholes opened, paradoxes woven and parallel universes breached.

Ray Bradbury - A Sound of Thunder
Henry Kuttner & C.L. Moore - Vintage Season
John Chu - Thirty Seconds from Now
Harry Turtledove - Forty, Counting Down
David Langford - The Final Days
Connie Willis - Fire Watch
Kage Baker - Noble Mold
George R.R. Martin - Under Siege
Steven Utley - Where or When

Garry Kilworth - On the Watchtower at Plataea

Kage Baker - A Night on the Barbary Coast
Elizabeth Bear - This Tragic Glass
George-Olivier ChÃ¢teauraynaud - The Gulf of Years
Max Beerbohm - Enoch Soames: A Memory of the Eighteen-Nineties
